  • Classes in com.tomtom.speedtools.services.sms used by com.tomtom.speedtools.services 
    Class and Description
    SMSDeliveryReportListenerRegistry
    This class keeps track of the listener for SMS delivery reports.
  • Classes in com.tomtom.speedtools.services.sms used by com.tomtom.speedtools.services.sms 
    Class and Description
    SMSDeliveryReportListener
    Called when a delivery report is received from the SMS provider.
    SMSDeliveryReportListener.DeliveryStatus 
    SMSDeliveryReportParameterException
    Exception used to report errors from the SMSDeliveryReportProcessor.
    SMSDeliveryReportProcessor
    This processor is a strategy for processing delivery reports.
    SMSProviderConnector.Status
    Status codes to describe the result sending the message.
  • Classes in com.tomtom.speedtools.services.sms used by com.tomtom.speedtools.services.sms.implementation 
    Class and Description
    SMSDeliveryReportListenerRegistry
    This class keeps track of the listener for SMS delivery reports.
    SMSDeliveryReportResource
    Resteasy resource that will be called by the message provider to report about the delivery of a text message.
    SMSProviderConnector
    Implementers of this interface enable sending SMS messages.
